intro: Ceropegia jinshaensis, commonly known as the Jinsha tube-root, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asclepiadaceae and is characterized by its tuberous roots and trailing stems. The plant produces small, tubular flowers that are typically greenish-yellow in color. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often growing in rocky or sandy soils. Due to its limited distribution and unique morphology, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
